item.title: GERN
item.description: score:78 Chances: Geron Corporation is developing a telomerase inhibitor, Imetelstat, in hematologic myeloid malignancies, which shows promising prospects in the field of oncology. The FDA’s potential expansion of the use of multiple myeloma cell therapies and other top-selling medicines indicates a favorable regulatory environment for Geron Corporation’s products.
